h2.span: A School As Unique As You Are

div.p: The traditional approach to high school just doesnât work for a lot of students.
Thatâs why we designed a high school as unique as you are. Mason Run High School is different from other schools.

ul.li: A safe school environment without all the drama
Caring teachers focused on helping you graduate
The chance to work at your own pace so you can catch up or even graduate early
Flexible classes that work around your schedule
Job training so you can get a diploma AND a career

a.span: When you come in to drop off your completed work,

img.alt: When you come in to drop off your completed work, please leave it in this tray on the corner of the front desk. MAKE SURE YOUR NAME IS ON IT OR IT WILL NOT COUNT!!!!! There is a stapler next to the tray you can use to make sure your packets stay together.
Instagram post 17846072144004686

img.alt: If youâre on the grad list, be sure to come pick up your packets. This along with the packets you received last week, will count for THE REST OF YOUR CREDITS TOWARD GRADUATION! So be sure to complete them. Teacher contact info will be included if you have any questions ð.

div.p: We know that every student learns differently. Our approach is to understand what each student needs to succeed and help them chart a path to graduation and a clear career path.
Our school is a proud member of Oakmont Education, a network of schools committed to reengaging youth and empowering them to make real, lasting changes in their lives.
